name: LR WRounded search/text box theme - Google etc
description:
please support me if you enjoy this; thank you to everyone who has already!
v2.7

Matches my ff3 theme:  http://userstyles.org/styles/6292

also, as a little extra, wide search results on google (full width; generally shows quotes on one line) and vista-colored top box on google (see screenshot)
I'm currently working on remaking this theme over again; see http://userstyles.org/styles/6522

google, amazon, yahoo, ebay, pubmed, userstyles, userscripts, wikipedia, piratebay, mozilla addons, amf, yahoo fantasy, youtube... and many more
